CustomField.formula: VALUE(IF(Phone = null, "0",IF(AND(LEFT(Account_Region__c,8) = "Americas", LEFT(Phone, 1)= "+") ,"1",IF(AND(LEFT(Account_Region__c,8) <> "Americas", LEFT(Phone, 1)<> "+") ,"1", IF(LEFT(Phone, 1)= "1","1", IF(LEFT(Phone, 1)= "0","1",IF(CONTAINS(Phone, "x"),"1",IF(AND(LEFT(Account_Region__c, 8) <> "Americas", CONTAINS(Phone, "-")),"1",IF(AND(LEFT(Account_Region__c, 8)<> "Americas", CONTAINS(Phone, "(")),"1",IF(AND(LEFT(Account_Region__c, 8) = "Americas", LEFT(Phone, 1)<> "(") ,"1",IF( CONTAINS(Phone, "~"),"1",IF( CONTAINS(Phone, "."),"1",IF( LEN(Phone)< 10,"1", "0")))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Incorrect Phone Number Format
